com.adrenalinici.adrenaline.server.model

Class Dashboard

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adrenalinici.adrenaline.server.model.Dashboard

  • public class Dashboard
extends Object
    Class representing game dashboard
    Each cell is determined by a tuple (line, cell), for example:
    0, 0 0, 1 0, 2
    1, 0 1, 1 1, 2
    2, 0 2, 1 2, 2

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Dashboard.Builder
      This builder helps the construction of the cell.

        This method calculates the positions in which a player can move, doing only movements in a given direction (e.g. if range is 2 it can do two step north but not one north and then one east).

      • calculateCardinalDirection

        public com.adrenalinici.adrenaline.common.model.CardinalDirection calculateCardinalDirection(com.adrenalinici.adrenaline.common.model.Position start,
                                                                                             com.adrenalinici.adrenaline.common.model.Position arrival)
        This method calulates in which cardinal direction the "arrival" position is, as compared to "start" position. It returns SAME if the two arguments are equals. It returns NONE if the "arrival" is not in one of the 4 basic cardinal directions as compared to "start".
        Parameters:
        start -
        arrival -
        Returns:
